message: You're in luck! This is one of our premium products, and I'm offering it to you for $100. Many of our satisfied customers have loved this product, and I'm confident you will too. It's a rare opportunity to get your hands on a high-quality item at a great price. What do you say? Will you take it home with you today?
I appreciate the recommendation and the fact that this is a premium product.  Since there's no sales history yet, I'm willing to take a chance and buy it. I'm hoping it lives up to the hype!
